name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HaloLink - Tools to improve query efficiency
name.zh_CN: HaloLink - 提高查询效率的工具
name.zh_TW: HaloLink - 提高查詢效率的工具

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pop-up for accessing and managing bookmarks, downloads, browsing history, and extensions.Boot mode: Alt/Command+Q
short.zh_CN: 弹窗查看/管理书签、下载记录、历史记录、扩展程序。启动方式：Alt/Command+Q
short.zh_TW: 彈窗查看/管理書籤、下載記錄、歷史記錄、擴展程序。啟動方式：Alt/Command+Q

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
打开扩展弹窗的唯一方法(可自定义快捷键)：Alt + Q；
关闭扩展弹窗显示：Alt + Q或ESC；
支持搜索、键盘交互、书签拖拽排序、常用书签收藏；
支持默认显示设置和字体大小设置；
在书签和历史记录时：
· 点击(或回车键)打开对象
· Ctrl +单击(或Enter)在新选项卡中打开
· Alt +点击(或Enter)在隐身窗口打开

The only way to open the extension popup (customizable shortcut key) : Alt + Q;
Close the extension pop-up window to display: Alt + Q or ESC;
Support search, keyboard interaction, bookmark drag-and-drop sorting, common bookmark collection;
Support default display Settings and font size Settings;
In bookmarks and history:
· Click (or enter) to open the object
· Ctrl + click (or Enter) to open in a new TAB
· Alt + Click (or Enter) to open in the incognito window
